input.content: Show me the sentiments of the speaker in this video: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/iQ3yXScDuEA

content: Obtain video content from the specified YouTube source

next_agent.name: goal_agent
next_agent.reason: Objectives have been defined for speaker sentiment analysis of a YouTube video. The Goal Agent must decompose these objectives into actionable goals including video acquisition, audio transcription, speaker diarization, and sentiment model execution.

status.message: Request validated and objectives generated successfully. YouTube Shorts is a supported source and speaker sentiment analysis is within platform capabilities.

audit.compliance_notes: Request is within platform scope. YouTube is a supported source per Section 7 of application.md. Speaker Sentiment Analysis is a listed capability under Speaker Analysis in Section 6 (Capabilities Matrix). All generated objectives map to defined platform capabilities: video acquisition (Supported Sources), speaker identification (Audio Analysis - Speaker ID/Diarization), and sentiment determination (Speaker Analysis - Sentiment Analysis). No governance concerns identified.
